scripts.build: clear && clear && parcel build index.html about-us.html
scripts.deploy:stage: clear && clear && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'env/stage: Deploying assets to stage.' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin env/stage
scripts.deploy:prod: clear && clear && npm run build && git add dist && git commit -m 'env/prod: Deploying assets to prod.' && git subtree push --prefix dist origin env/prod
